page.title: 09THE "MARGINAL" CANNICH AREA
page.content:
{Land type and quality,}by British Government standards, is "Marginal". In the EEC less favoured areas are classed as "Severely Disadvantaged".
Within the farming community there is more or less an even balance between tenants and owner/occupiers.
There are very few{crofts}and none are capable of providing a living for even one person if agriculture is the only income. The main type of{farming practised is{Livestock Rearing.
There is no pig farming and any poultry kept are in small numbers, eggs being sold locally.
